entry.title: Tender Moments
entry.summary:
Author: BerriUsagi

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,375Chapters: 1/3Kudos: 0

Summary: "I missed our date," Bruce said, as Clark set him on the foot of his bed and gently brushed his hair back from his face."You did," Clark nodded, sitting beside him, "We can plan another."Bruce groaned, hunching over, bracing his elbows on his knees, and rubbing his hands over his face. Tonight was meant to be a night for him to relax, to get to enjoy some time with Clark and not be The Bat for a night.

entry.title: Under Kansas Starlight
entry.summary:
Author: brmqtr

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,976Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 7

Summary: When Martha Kent’s anniversary party turns into a full-blown superhero fiasco, Bruce and Clark find themselves battling drones, malfunctioning farm equipment, and the unrelenting optimism of Smallville’s townsfolk. Bruce swore this trip would be a quiet family weekend; Clark swore he’d keep things low profile. Neither was right. Between Lois filming everything, Jonathan shaking his head at the chaos, and Martha insisting Bruce sit still for first aid, the world’s most formidable detective is forced to endure the one thing he can’t outthink—domestic affection. But when the stars finally rise over the Kent farm, and the laughter fades into night, Bruce admits what Clark has known all along: even the Dark Knight can believe in peace, under Kansas starlight.

entry.title: Call Me When the Night Ends
entry.summary:
Author: prime_myriad

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,105Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 7

Summary: As much as he'd like to ignore it, Bruce Wayne is getting older. The nights are longer, the bruises take more time to fade, and Gotham doesn’t slow down for anyone, not even Batman. When a new alien species makes its presence known in Metropolis, Bruce finds himself outmatched and increasingly aware of his own limits. Seeking answers, and maybe something more, he turns to the one man who still believes he can be more than the mask. What begins as an uneasy alliance might just become the partnership he didn’t know he needed.

entry.title: guess i'm a coward (i just want to feel alright)
entry.summary:
Author: snapdragonsuplex

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,476Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 228

Summary: "Now, tell me, how are you doing?” Clark pauses, looking over at her. “What do you mean?” “Honey, you just had a baby dropped in your lap. I know from experience that that can be a heck of a thing to come to grips with. Are you okay?” Clark swallows. He feels it, creeping up in his gut, his chest, his throat, trying to get out, forcing him to admit that he-! Don’t think about it. He forces himself to smile. “I’m okay, Ma, really.”--------------------------Clark introduces Conner to his parents, his robots, his cousin and her dog, all while trying to ignore how he feels about the darker implications of the whole thing.
